ComicInfo.Title: What if the Thing Continued to Mutate?; What if the Beast Had Truly Become a Beast?; What if Galactus Had Turned the Silver Surfer Back into Norrin Radd?
ComicInfo.Summary:
What if the Thing Continued to Mutate?: The Thing continues to Mutate from Virus-X.
What if the Beast Had Truly Become a Beast?: The formula which turned the Beast into his current state mutates him more.
What if Galactus Had Turned the Silver Surfer Back into Norrin Radd?: Galactus not only strands the Silver Surfer on Earth, but also turns him human.
